caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Passage of Rights of Persons with Disabilities Bill - 2016 is a landmark moment & will add tremendous strength to Accessible India movement.

Under the Act, the types of disabilities have increased & at the same time provisions for additional benefits have been introduced. There are strict provisions for penalties for offences committed against persons with disabilities & violation of provisions of the new law.

The new Act has several salient features which will enhance opportunity, equality & accessibility. Have a look. 
http://nm-4.com/gazz
